attributes.action: Rape of Human Rights in Lambeth cuonty court
attributes.additional_details:
"Harwood-Davis, Phillip" <Phillip.Harwood-Davis@ojc.gsi.gov.uk> wrote:


    Dear Sir/Madam,
    Thank you for your letter of 18 October.
    Your letter was received by the Office for Judicial Complaints on 24 October and will be referred to one of our caseworkers who will consider the matters that you raise and send you a response by 14 November 2007. If for any reason, we cannot meet this target, we will write to you again, informing you of the cause of delay and by when you can expect to receive a reply.
    Your sincerely
    Philip Davis
    Office for Judicial Complaints
    020 7189 2936

    Dear sir, I made a complaint in 20007.So.far no reply
